product_name: Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hat - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Canyon Sun Hat has a wide brim that provides ample sun protection when you're on the trail or laying on the beach. Wrinkle-resistant, quick-drying polyester fabric is lightweight, breathable and durable. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. CoolMax(R) sweatband wicks moisture off of your brow. Dark color on the underside of the brim helps reduce glare in your eyes on sunny days. Drawcord under chin allows for a secure, customized fit. Closeout.
